dcterms:description: A high-quality human-constructed dataset containing 12,080 training samples, 1,538 validation samples, and 1,742 testing samples. The dataset includes textual premises that have passed human cross-check annotation and contain six categories: relationship, personality, mood, and so on.
dcterms:title: PMR

dcterms:creator: R. Zellers
Y. Bisk
A. Farhadi
Y. Choi
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for visual commonsense reasoning, where the task is to infer the answer based on a given rationale and question, reformulated into a new premise and image.
dcterms:title: VCR
